item.title: Marwa add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Marwa add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Marwa Ayad
item.description: "How life teaches us, breaks us, rewards us, and tears us apart... how it lifts us up and brings us down... the wonder of life." -- Marwa Ayad

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Marwa Ayad
item.description: "Isn't it the unexpected that teaches us the most?" -- Marwa Ayad

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everyone seems to have a clear idea of how other people should lead their lives, but none about his or her own." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Tell your heart that the fear of suffering is worse than the suffering itself. And that no heart has ever suffered when it goes in search of its dreams, because every second of the search is a second's encounter with God and with eternity." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "People are capable, at any time in their lives, of doing what they dream of." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Marwa add a quote by أحلام مستغانمي
item.description: "أحسد الأطفال الرضّع، لأنهم يملكون وحدهم حق الصراخ والقدرة عليه، قبل أن تروض الحياة حبالهم الصوتية، وتعلِّمهم الصمت" -- أحلام مستغانمي

item.title: Marwa add a quote by أحلام مستغانمي
item.description: "إننا ننتمي إلى أمة لا تحترم مبدعيها وإذا فقدنا غرورنا وكبرياءنا، ستدوسنا أقدام الأُميّين والجهلة!" -- أحلام مستغانمي

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "If you do not breathe through writing, if you do not cry out in writing, or sing in writing, then don't write, because our culture has no use for it." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Marwa add a quote by عباس محمود العقاد
item.description: "رُبَّ رجلٌ وسيمٌ غير محبوب ، ورُبَّ رجل وسيم محبوب غير مهيب ، ورُبََّ رجل وسيم يحبه الناس ويهابونه وهو لا يحب الناس ولا يعطف عليهم ولا يبادلهم الوفاء ، أما محمد عليه السلام فقد استوفى شمائل الوسامة والمحبة والعطف على الناس . فكان على ما يختاره واصفوه ومحبوه ، وكان نعم المسمى بالمختار . " -- عباس محمود العقاد

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Marwa Ayad
item.description: "I'm THAT complicated, mysterious, yet content with the "simple" things in life. Don't try to understand me; you won't figure me out. But you're free to like me the way I am." -- Marwa Ayad

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Fromm, Eric
item.description: "Love isn't something natural. Rather it requires discipline, concentration, patience, faith, and the overcoming of narcissism. It isn't a feeling, it is a practice." -- Fromm, Eric

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I have a history of making decisions very quickly about men. I have always fallen in love fast and without measuring risks. I have a tendency not only to see the best in everyone, but to assume that everyone is emotionally capable of reaching his highest potential. I have fallen in love more times than I care to count with the highest potential of a man, rather than with the man himself, and I have hung on to the relationship for a long time (sometimes far too long) waiting for the man to ascend to his own greatness. Many times in romance I have been a victim of my own optimism." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Marwa add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something." -- Elizabeth Gilbert
